Class Game

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.World
Game
public class Game extends greenfoot.World
This class was originally intended to manage many games, but due to time constraints, only Maze1 is available

      creates a new game
      Parameters:

    • newGame

      public void newGame()
      creates a new game, which comprises of only Maze1 for now

    • makeLimits

      protected void makeLimits()
      creates the 4 borders around a map, to prevent in-game objects from interacting with scoreboards and such

    • makeScores2

      protected void makeScores2()
      creates the scoreboard for multiplayer games

    • makeScores

      protected void makeScores()
      creates the scoreboard for singleplayer games

    • startCounting

      public void startCounting()
      called whenever a tank has died, this toggles the counting flag to end the game. This is to make sure that in multiplayer, a player does not die immediately after killing their opponent.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      called when games are ended, this adds a point to any player that did not die that round in multiplayer, and shows the score screen in singleplayer. Note that if you check the source code, the "problem" Label should normally never show up, so if it does show up, consider sending a bug report :)

    • resetScores

      public static void resetScores()
      resets the score
